mapper.insert: INSERT INTO samplefile(sample_no, samplefile_path, samplefile_name, samplefile_ext, samplefile_type, samplefile_size, samplefile_date) VALUES(#{sampleNo}, #{sampleFilePath}, #{sampleFileName}, #{sampleFileExt}, #{sampleFileType}, #{sampleFileSize}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT sf.samplefile_path as sampleFilePath ,sf.samplefile_name as sampleFileName ,sf.samplefile_ext as sampleFileExt ,sf.samplefile_size as sampleFileSize FROM samplefile as sf WHERE sf.sample_no= #{sampleNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE samplefile SET samplefile_path=#{sampleFilePath}, samplefile_name=#{sampleFileName}, samplefile_ext=#{sampleFileExt}, samplefile_type=#{sampleFileType}, samplefile_size=#{sampleFileSize}, samplefile_date=now() WHERE sample_no = #{sampleNo}
